name: Superstuff
description:
What started out as "flappy bird with lasers" is now "flappy bird with lasers and a touch of Mario Run."

The game is just three levels at this point due to the constraints of Ludum Dare.  The first is an in-game tutorial (a first-time feature for me), so I'm leaving instructions out of the description to see how effective it is.

I consider this a little bit of a proof of concept. I'd like to turn it into a mobile game with a lot more levels or perhaps an endless mode. The full version would have more variety. I welcome any feedback.

Enjoy!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/superstuff
